author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is needed for preparation of future migration to Geant4 10.7. It includes:

1. removal of obsolete OscarProducer and RunManager old sequential simulation;
2. removal of obsolete Physics Lists;
3. introduction of time control on Geant4 initialisation if debug printout is enabled
4. improvements in debug printouts

No effect on existing WFs and unit tests are expected.   

#### PR validation:
private


#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
no
title: Clean-up Geant4 interfaces
